General.Name: Hites S.A.
General.Description: Empresas Hites S.A. engages in the retail business in Chile. It is involved in the retail sale of various clothing, electro, and home decor products through its multi-stores. The company is also involved in the financial business, such as granting direct loans to customers through sales in its multi-stores and internet channel. Empresas Hites S.A. was incorporated in 2000 and is based in Santiago, Chile.

4.Name: Eduardo Rodriguez Perez
4.Title: Mang. of Legal & Corp. Affairs Division
